version_description: We’ve just released an update for our new iOS app! The version 1.1.0 is here. We decided to focus on the most critical issues such as app crashes and Google Sign-In issues. We’ve also reduced traffic consumption and battery drain. Never a bad thing, right

We made the app more stable - always a good thing, right?

Below is the complete list of fixes and improvements.

• Fixed a crash when sending and receiving screenshots simultaneously
• Fixed incorrect previews of charts and ideas
•

Meet the new Ideas Section in the mobile app! You can now follow popular ideas on the go.

We’ve also improved functionality of watchlists and chats, and the app is now faster. And we are just getting started :) Stay tuned for more updates, we’ve go
App stability improved.
Fib Speed Resistance Fan drawing fixed.
Fixed a number of bugs caused by iOS11.
Fixed the chart symbol reset during an unstable internet connection.

-新增想法流。
-更改了用户的档案配置设计，现在你可以看到用户发布的想法了。
-选项卡图标与很多其他图形元素一起更改。
-更新app图标和加载页面。
-我们更新了商品搜索过滤器的设计，新增了加密资产的图标。
-修复在登录和注册过程中出现的图形小错误。
-修正了视频想法导致错误的问题。
-新增锁绘图功能，可以在使用图表时使用。
-修正了一些导致app闪退的错误。
-一些其他小的修复和改进。

看看我们更完善的新版本 - 刚出炉的IOS app。热烘烘的还烫手呢！
我们彻夜不倦地工作，几乎把所有的设计都打磨完善了。 成果真是棒极了。尤其是我们的开发主管仍然着迷于上面的滚动标题而不能自拔......我们无法把他拉开...哦、好吧，来看看吧！
除了重新设计，我们做了一堆修正和改进（扰流板警报-这个版本中没有警报）。
- 修正了一些IOS 11造成的错误。亲爱的苹果，我们的测试人员向您的测试人员致以最热烈的问候。
- 增加支持 iPhone X。我们其实沒有一台在手上，所以如果

感谢您的反馈帮助我们提高app。我们已经重新设计了自选表 - 现在可以适应更多商品品种了。
一些商品的错误价格值已经被修复。
Web版本中包含的自定义时间周期现在也可以在app中正确显示了。
修复了很多在使用自选表和观点时导致app崩溃的问题。
修复了一些小bug，同时也做了一些小改进。
Fixed application crash, caused by the screen rotation.
修复了很难通过齿轮图标打开设置的问题

-新增想法流。
-更改了用户的档案配置设计，现在你可以看到用户发布的想法了。
-选项卡图标与很多其他图形元素一起更改。
-更新app图标和加载页面。
-我们更新了商品搜索过滤器的设计，新增了加密资产的图标。
-修复在登录和注册过程中出现的图形小错误。
-修正了视频想法导致错误的问题。
-新增锁绘图功能，可以在使用图表时使用。
-修正了一些导致app闪退的错误。
-一些其他小的修复和改进。

We’ve got some good news for you! Many of you have been waiting for this since the very beginning of our iOS app release. Your patience has been rewarded. TradingView natively supports iPad now!
All app features are available on the iPad now, but that’

— 重新设计了发送消息对话框。
— 更改了注册表格，以使其符合通用数据保护条例（GDPR）。
— 提升了app的整体稳定性。

引入横向浏览 - 现在比以往更容易使用 iPad app!
以下是我们所做的其他改进。
- 在浏览观点时，您现在可以享受无缝体验。向右/向左滑动即可切换观点。
- 价格变化现在显示为百分比和绝对数值。
- 改善app的整体稳定性。

- 修复了一个阻碍自选表更新的问题。
- 修复了一些导致这款应用崩溃的关键问题。
- 实施了许多小的修复和改进。
我们非常感谢所有的反馈，因为它帮助我们进一步更好的开发应用，并添加更多的功能。我们在最新的更新中介绍了暗色主题，这是你们一直在要求的改进。去试一试吧，我们肯定你会喜欢的！

- 当没有网路连接时，我们改善了app的稳定性。
- 修复了当改变屏幕方向时发生的图形问题。
- 修复了导致类似计数器的观点无法正常工作的问题。
- 修复了许多导致app当机的问题。
- 其他修复和改善。

Thank you so much for your feedback! We analyze each and every review on a regular basis and are going to surprise you with some cool new features soon! In the meantime, take a look at the fixes and updates below.
-Theme color can be changed without lo

谨代表整个TradingView团队向大家表示感谢，感谢大家对我们App的反馈、帮助以及如何改进的建议，这对我们的发展有巨大的贡献!

我们很高兴地宣布推出有警报通知推送功能的新版App!我们收到很多要求实现这个功能，希望大家会喜欢。
在建立警报时，在应用程序上启用通知推送并按OK保存您的选项。当符合某些条件时，您会在手机上收到推送通知。注意，您需要允许TradingView应用程序的推送通知。如果您喜欢之前的方式，还可以继续通过邮件接收通知。期待您的反馈，敬请持续关注更新!
提高整体稳定性 - 我们修复了一些导致app崩溃以及许多图形和UI的问题。
Overall stability of the app (including errors that were causing app to crash) was improved.
Last but not least, we’ve changed the way charts are saved in the new version - last used chart is now saved on your device automatically regardless of what you opened on any other device.

我们会定期更新应用以使其更适合您。 这是新的东西：
- 修正了使用黑暗主题时显示市场状态不正确的问题
- 你现在可以双击以点赞想法
- 应用程序大小已减少
- 您现在可以拉动刷新自己和他人的个人资料
- 修复了导致应用崩溃的一些问题
庆祝圣诞节假期和TradingView app更新！拿一杯热巧克力，试着发现有趣的隐藏功能 - 说不定会看到下雪呢！下次更新将在2019年 - 大家尽情享受假期吧！
We are out of snow which is why this feature is no longer available.

新版本包含以下更改：
- 您现在可以在图表上设置警报，并可以撤销或重复一个动作
- 我们改进了夜间主题中观点列表的显示。
- 变更次要的设计。TradingView的新蓝色主题现已能在iOS app中使用。
- 修正聊天室app闪退和信息消失的漏洞

We are happy to announce the latest update of the app. The following changes were made:
- Landscape mode is now available on all screens.
- Fixed an issue that was causing certain elements of the app to be displayed incorrectly during an incoming ca

- 改进了自选表。您现在可以用各种参数进行排序。
- 已保存的时间范围已移至单独的屏幕，可以更容易地在时间范围之间切换。
- 一些小的改進和修復。
喜欢这款app？请给我们评价！您的反馈让我们进步！

- Overall stability has been improved. We've fixed a number of issues that were causing the app to crash.
- New drawing tools were added - Cross Line & Date and Price Range.
- Fixed an issue that was making it impossible to select a drawing tool
庆祝圣诞节假期和TradingView app更新！拿一杯热巧克力，试着发现有趣的隐藏功能 - 说不定会看到下雪呢！下次更新将在2019年 - 大家尽情享受假期吧！
We are out of snow which is why this feature is no longer available.

这里是最新消息：
- 增加了新的语言。
- 现在可以一键隐藏绘图工具。
我们努力完成这些改进，希望您会喜欢。感谢您选择TradingView！
- 一些本地语言翻译修正
有时您只需要放松并且使用WhatsApp与家人和朋友聊天。我们的免费TradingView贴纸将为这些对话增添更多乐趣。来看看吧！

最新版包含：
- 各种稳定性改进和错误修复

我们倾听您的反馈并不断添加新功能！您现在可以分享并关注来自世界各地的数百万交易者发布的观点。本次的更新如下：
- 全新的品种页面，包括最新以及热门观点
- 可以发表观点的功能

我们希望春天已经降临您的地方！如果还没有，请尝试使用我们的更新版让您振作起来：
- TradingView贴纸现在不仅可以在WhatsApp中使用，也可以在Telegram中使用；
- 在观点屏幕，更正了商品描述；
- 解决了在行情屏幕上显示商品名称的问题；
- 新用户的本地化行情列表；
- 消除了无法查看用户观点的错误。

我们会定期更新应用以使其更适合您。 这是新的东西：
- 修正了使用黑暗主题时显示市场状态不正确的问题
- 你现在可以双击以点赞想法
- 应用程序大小已减少
- 您现在可以拉动刷新自己和他人的个人资料
- 修复了导致应用崩溃的一些问题
提高整体稳定性 - 我们修复了一些导致app崩溃以及许多图形和UI的问题。

我们不断地工作，对app进行了以下修改：
- 增加了从推播通知中打开图表的功能
- 增加了图表属性按钮；
- 提高整体稳定性 - 我们修复了一些导致app当机、以及许多图形和UI问题的错误。

This update includes the following fixes & improvements:
- A number of issues that were happening when using iOS 13 were fixed;
- Overall stability of the app (including errors that were causing app to crash) was improved.
Overall stability of the app (including errors that were causing app to crash) was improved.
Overall stability of the app (including errors that were causing app to crash) was improved.

With our new app version we tried to make you a little happier this fall:
- made small, but necessary changes on the registration page and in the symbol search;
- fixed bug on the chart screen, that led to the opening of the full screen mode on iPad
Last but not least, we’ve changed the way charts are saved in the new version - last used chart is now saved on your device automatically regardless of what you opened on any other device.

嗨！ 在这个寒冷的秋天，我们有一些让您感到温暖的地方-更新了观点页面的TradingView应用程序新版本！ 现在，查看和评论观点更加容易。
请注意，未来的应用程序版本将不再支持iOS 10。这将使我们能够更快地添加新功能并改进现有功能。
修复了一个阻碍自选表更新的问题。
修复了一个阻碍自选表更新的问题。
修复了一个阻碍自选表更新的问题。

Days became shorter and colder with the onset of winter. But we enjoy the snow, Christmas vibes and the TradingView app update, which includes:
• Pine script code can now be copied from the idea you like.
• The idea publishing date is fixed.
• Th

Jingle bells, jingle bells, jingle all the way, oh, what fun it is to… check your yearly returns, watch the Santa rally, and enjoy gifts. We have a gift for you — the new version of the TradingView app! Besides several fixes and improvements, a holiday su

Jingle bells, jingle bells, jingle all the way, oh, what fun it is to… check your yearly returns, watch the Santa rally, and enjoy gifts. We have a gift for you — the new version of the TradingView app! Besides several fixes and improvements, a holiday su

Already missing Boxing Day? Well, we have a few up our sleeves for you.
Meet our updated iOS app version with:
• fixed the way forex instruments are displayed in Today View widget;
• fixed the displaying of comments and ideas;
• images in chat

Tesla shares may set new records, but we are not far behind! We have updated our app and it is now equipped with the following new features and fixes:
• Views are now updated when you click on the idea card.
• Expanded click space on the idea card.<

We like to think that you're out there waiting for our app updates as eagerly as you are a Game of Thrones series finale remake. Take a look to see what we've added!
• We've fixed the chart's ability to load on the idea screen;
• We've fixed visual

Spring has come, and soon it will be warm and sunny again. But we couldn't wait for it to warm up before giving you an update of the TradingView app, so enjoy!
• We've added an interactive chart on the ideas page in iPhone in landscape mode.
• A mea

Not even a global pandemic can stop us from improving our app, except we are taking breaks to excessively wash our hands.
In our new version:
• we've added the ability to create an account using the "Sign in with Apple" function; and
• we made a

即使是全球性的大流行，也不能阻止我们改进app，除非我们要休息一下顺便洗个手。
在我们的新版本中：
• 我们增加了 “使用Apple登录” 建立帐户的功能；
• 我们制作了一个编辑您的个人资料的新界面；和
• 我们增加了使用双因子身份验证登录的功能。
照顾自己，注意安全，以及待在家里

We just can't be stopped! We continue working hard to improve our TradingView app for you with all of our strength and resources. What have we added? Let's take a look:
• A new menu item, "Delete." Now you can easily and quickly delete all drawings and

As the weather heats up and our moods gradually improve, our TradingView team is trying to keep up with producing new quality app releases.
What's new this time? Let's see:
• the app is now available in India;
• the panel on the ideas screen is n

Waiting for summer to kick off, moving forward and fixing bugs, all while trying to improve the app user-experience.
• Added the ability to close ideas by swiping right.
• Added a context menu by tapping on messages in chats and comments.
• Fixed
Made minor fixes and general improvements.

等待已经结束，童鞋们，夏天终于来临，阳光灿烂明媚。现在您已可以在TradingView app管理警报了！
我们还为您准备了这些：
• 增加了“Anchored VWAP”和“箭头标记”绘图工具；
• 修复了几个问题，包括股票清单、个人资料编辑、和观点。
请注意：我们的app的下一版本将不再支援iOS 11和iOS 12。这让我们不仅可以更快地发布新功能，还可以更频繁地为您提供更新。对于那些无法升级到iOS 13的用户，目前的app版本仍然可用。

Summer is in full swing, but don’t expect that to stop us from updating and improving our app. Here’s what we’ve got for you:
• Added logos of instruments on the watchlist and instrument screens.
• Fixed bugs with animation and date display on the I

Summer is in full swing, but don’t expect that to stop us from updating and improving our app. Here’s what we’ve got for you:
• Added logos of instruments on the watchlist and instrument screens.
• Fixed bugs with animation and date display on the I

As many people try and cool off from the summer heat and enjoy socially-distanced staycations, our team continues to work hard and update our app. In this new version, we have some special surprises (hopefully good ones) with a new toolbar on the chart. I

TradingView is not just charts, charts, and more charts — we're also a social network for traders and investors. In this update, we've added the ability to follow users and their posts. But don't think we've forgotten about improving charts. Here's what w

Seasonal changes always bring new opportunities and chances to improve for the better. That's exactly how it works with our app. Check below for our new upgrades.
• We've added pre- and post-market data for instruments in watchlists;
• We've added t

我们知道您等待已久，它们终于准备好了。适用于iOS14的小部件和并可直接在主屏上查看报价 — 跟踪市场变化从未如此简单过。
但是，此番更新还有更多内容，包括：
•在图表屏幕上添加了提示
•禁用自选表中商品logo的新选项
•App中的其他较小的变更和改进

The world is full of extraordinary events right now, and one of them must certainly be our latest app update. We’ve been busy adding tons of new feature for you, including:
• Bar Replay on the charts
• a button to scroll to the last idea’s comments<

To celebrate the fast approaching end of 2020, we made a bet on how many app improvements we’d ship before the New Year. For this latest update we’ve:
• Added flagged lists support
• Simplified switching between symbols on the chart
• Added magne

To celebrate the fast approaching end of 2020, we made a bet on how many app improvements we’d ship before the New Year. For this latest update we’ve:
• Added flagged lists support
• Simplified switching between symbols on the chart
• Added magne

Happy to announce the new version of our app. We’ve completely redesigned two menus:
• chart types selection
• list of drawing tools
We hope you like these sleek new menus and their improved functionality.

Happy to announce the new version of our app. We’ve added support for spreads in the search field, and completely redesigned three menus:
• chart types selection
• list of drawing tools
• intervals selection on the chart
We hope you like these

New year, back to work, lots to do. So we'll keep this short:
Our first app update in 2021 offers:
• drag and drop symbols in your watchlists — no need to enter Edit Mode now.
• two new drawing tools: Highlighter and Fixed Range Volume Profile.

We continue on improving our handy app. In this new version, we've:
• changed the watchlist edit mode
• fixed several issues that sometimes happened when you deleted symbols from the list

We continue on improving our handy app. In this new version, we've:
• changed the watchlist edit mode
• fixed several issues that sometimes happened when you deleted symbols from the list

加密货币价格如日初升，势不可当。TradingView也是如此 — 我们一直为app添加新功能并提高稳定性。
在这个新版本中，我们：
•解决了自选表的编辑问题
•添加了在图表屏幕上快速切换时间周期的功能
•添加了停留在绘图模式的功能
•更改了图表屏幕上的工具栏
